price: 7. Tokkel maqaanek qunxa xuuneyti qilsah gide abe num, wohih galto able íe.
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
